1. When I fail at something important to me I become consumed by feelings of inadequacy. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
2. I try to be understanding and patient towards those aspects of my personality I don’t like. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
3. When something painful happens I try to take a balanced view of the situation. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
4. When I’m feeling down, I tend to feel like most other people are probably happier than I am. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
5. I try to see my failings as part of the human condition. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
6. When I’m going through a very hard time, I give myself the caring and tenderness I need. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
7. When something upsets me I try to keep my emotions in balance. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
8. When I fail at something that’s important to me, I tend to feel alone in my failure (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
9. When I’m feeling down I tend to obsess and fixate on everything that’s wrong. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
10. When I feel inadequate in some way, I try to remind myself that feelings of inadequacy are shared by most people. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
11. I’m disapproving and judgmental about my own flaws and inadequacies. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
12. I’m intolerant and impatient towards those aspects of my personality I don’t like. (1= Almost never, 2 = Rarely, 3 = Sometimes, 4 = Often, 5 = Almost always)
